hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Musa Al-Ash`ari:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Many men reached perfection but none among the women reached perfection except Mary, the daughter of ' `Imran, and Asia, Pharoah's wife. And the superiority of `Aisha to other women is like the superiority of Tharid to other kinds of food

chapter.eng-name: Ath-Tharid (a dish prepared from meat and bread).
